page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: {HOUSING The housing in Glass is old and there are many ruins of old crofts now used as a shelter by sheep out on the hill_sides.There are small tenant houses and a few large derelict farm houses.There is a small row of council houses called 'Deveron View Cottages' {QUESTIONS Q.Do you think there will be any housing schemes in Glass? A.No,definitly not.They can hardly get these ones let. Q.Do you like it here? A.No,I would like a large Farmhouse in the country. Q.Do you like it here? A.I didn't have much choice,we were homeless and needed a house. {these were asked at D_View cottages Most houses in Glass are 150 years old.
